alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Colleton; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 6:58PM EDT until June 12 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for portions of... Beaufort County in southeastern South Carolina... Colleton County in southeastern South Carolina... Jasper County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 658 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sheldon to near Tillman, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include: Beaufort, Port Royal, Ridgeland, Clarendon, Bennetts Point, Grahamville, Coosawhatchie, Gardens Corner, Lemon Island, Switzerland, Shell Point, Burton, Calawassie Island, Old House, and Laurel Bay. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 17 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
